Translations.Text: ‘Oh ban troh jamee tamong bak gopnyan Geumeubri saleum keu gopnyan bagah Seuot Ibrahim kamoe teumakot
Bek hai neutakot jamee dum peugah Haba gembira kamoe ba keunoe Aneuk agam droeuneuh alem leupah
Geukheun na patot gembira keu lon Watee umulon ka tuha leupah Pakrinyan takheun haba gembira
Kheun jamee teuka nyoe kon beurakah Haba sibeunar lonba bak gata Bek putoh asa gata meutuah
Kheun Ibrahim soe nyang putoh asa Mungken si buta nyang sisat leupah Han putoh asa bak rahmat Po jih Meunyoe kon ka jih sisat sileupah
Geukheun lom peue lom urusan gata Hai jamee teuka utusan Allah
Kheun jamee kamoe Neuyue jak keudeh Bak kawom paileh sisat sileupah
Laen nibak Luth ngon kawom gopnyan Bandum awaknyan ka Kamoe keubah Bandum binasa laen nibak Luth Ngon nyang ikot Luth nyang Kamoe peuglah
Teuma peureumohgeuh Kamoe kada Karoh binasa lam kawan salah
‘Oh ban troh rasul ubak Luth keunan
Geukheun di lon han lonteusoe peugah Hana lonturi bandum na gata
Kheun jamee teuka hana peue salah Kamoe nyoe teuka meuba peunyaket Nyang jikheun sulet watee tapeugah
Meuba keu gata haba nyang beunar Kamoe nyoe beunar peue nyang meupeugah
Tajak ngon kawomteuh euntreuk malam Dilikot kawom gata talangkah Bek na meusidroe nyang ngieng u likot € Tajak taturot peue kamoe peugah
Ka Kamoe wahyu keunan bak gopnyan Urusan jihnyan ka teutap sudah i Bak watee suboh bandum jih abeh Saba that paleh jipubuet salah
Awak lam keuta seunang that ate Keunan jijak le bak Luth meutuah
Kheun Luth uroenyoe bandum jameelon Bek peumalee lon tapeugot salah
Bandum na gata takwa keu Tuhan Bek peuayeb lon kawom meutuah
Jikheun kon ka lheuh kamoe tham gata Ureueng nyang teuka bek tapeusiblah
